languages.text: "Эх, горячо сегодня запылает печка! Грейтесь, люди добрые, от щедрот Звездного Сиятельства!"

traits.locale_text: "А ты громче, громче голоси! Особенно о тронах, что карман тянут! Глядишь, тебе и тут помогут — распорядиться богатством".{n} Хихикает скоморох.{/n}
traits.speaker: FW_TrueGovernor_Buffoon

languages.text: "Oh, the stove is burning hot today! Warm yourselves, my good fellows, for the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} is feeling generous!"
languages.original_text: "Эх, горячо сегодня запылает печка! Грейтесь, люди добрые, от щедрот Звездного Сиятельства!"

traits.locale_text: "Oh, the stove is burning hot today! Warm yourselves, my good fellows, for the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} is feeling generous today!"
"Oh, the stove is burning hot today! Warm yourselves, my good fellows, for the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} is feeling generous today!"

"Oh, the stove is burning hot today! Warm yourselves, my good fellows, for the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} is feeling generous!"
"Oh, the stove is burning hot today! Warm yourselves, my good fellows, for the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} is feeling generous!"

languages.text: “噢，今天的炉子烧得很旺嘛！我的好伙伴们，快来取暖吧，这位来自上界的大人实在是太慷慨啦！”
languages.original_text: "Oh, the stove is burning hot today! Warm yourselves, my good fellows, for the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} is feeling generous!"

traits.locale_text: “噢，今天的炉子烧得很旺嘛！我的好伙伴们，快来取暖吧，这位来自上界的大人实在是太慷慨啦！”

languages.text: «¡Uy, la barbacoa está hoy al rojo vivo! ¡Arrimaos al fuego, conciudadanos, que {mf|el Señor|la Señora} Celestial se siente {mf|generoso|generosa}!».
languages.original_text: "Oh, the stove is burning hot today! Warm yourselves, my good fellows, for the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} is feeling generous!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Uy, la barbacoa está hoy al rojo vivo! ¡Arrimaos al fuego, conciudadanos, que {mf|el Señor|la Señora} Celestial se siente {mf|generoso|generosa}!».

languages.text: "Ocak bugün gür yanıyor! Isının iyi dostlarım, zira Semavi {mf|Lordumuzun|Leydimizin} cömertliği üzerinde!"
languages.original_text: "Oh, the stove is burning hot today! Warm yourselves, my good fellows, for the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} is feeling generous!"

traits.locale_text: "Ocak bugün gür yanıyor! Isının iyi dostlarım, zira Semavi {mf|Lordumuzun|Leydimizin} cömertliği üzerinde!"

languages.text: 「今日はかまどがとても良く燃えている！みんな暖まろう、仲間たちよ、天の閣下は気前のよい方だ！」
languages.original_text: "Oh, the stove is burning hot today! Warm yourselves, my good fellows, for the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} is feeling generous!"

traits.locale_text: 「今日はかまどがとても良く燃えている！みんな暖まろう、仲間たちよ、天の閣下は気前のよい方だ！」

languages.text: « Eh bien, le poêle tourne à plein régime, aujourd'hui ! Réchauffez-vous, braves gens, car Sa Céleste Seigneurie est d'humeur généreuse ! »
languages.original_text: "Oh, the stove is burning hot today! Warm yourselves, my good fellows, for the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} is feeling generous!"

traits.locale_text: « Eh bien, le poêle tourne à plein régime, aujourd'hui ! Réchauffez-vous, braves gens, car Sa Céleste Seigneurie est d'humeur généreuse ! »

languages.text: "Oh, der Ofen brennt heute heiß! Wärmt Euch, meine guten Leute, denn {mf|der himmlische Herr|die himmlische Herrin} hat heute die Spendierhosen an!"
languages.original_text: "Oh, the stove is burning hot today! Warm yourselves, my good fellows, for the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} is feeling generous!"
